## tupleType() function

Constructs a [Type](./paratype.type.md) that represents a tuple with the specified item types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function tupleType<T extends [...unknown[]]>(...itemTypes: {
    [I in keyof T]: Type<T[I]>;
}): Type<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  itemTypes | { \[I in keyof T\]: [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;T\[I\]&gt;; } | Type of items in the tuple |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
